article_title: Congress Tries To Lower Drug Costs And Raises Health Insurance Premiums Instead

article_metadata.author: Merrill Matthews

og.description: When Congress decides to make health care more affordable, it often makes it more expensive; just look at what happened to certain prescription drugs in the 340B program.
og.title: Congress Tries To Lower Drug Costs And Raises Health Insurance Premiums Instead
